description: This table stores pediatric cancer staging information. Note that the only records extracted into this table are those with non-null data in the Pediatric Stage (I STG 300) item (Clarity column PEDIATRIC_STAGE_C).

columns.name: PEDIATRIC_STAGE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The pediatric stage.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: STAGE_TITLE_NM
columns.description: The title of this cancer stage row, usually indicative of the body site or cancer type being staged.
